item.title: Plot Missing Values
item.description: In one of DataCamp courses that I cannot remember which one, the instructor used geom_tile from ggplot2 package to visualize missing values. Here, I am going to replicate that using airquality dataset from base R. To start, we can use summary() and str() functions to inspect the data. summary(airquality) ## Ozone Solar.R Wind Temp ## Min. : 1.00 Min. : 7.0 Min. : 1.700 Min. :56.00 ## 1st Qu.: 18.00 1st Qu.
